website_summaries.verdict: Remarkably inexpensive yet exceedingly popular, this sun hat is perfect for babies and younger toddlers.
pros: Option to purchase for children who are newborn through 18 months of age
cons: Many customers complain that the hat's drawstring does not function as well as it should

customer_reviews.title: Beware of knockoffs!
customer_reviews.text: Beware knockoffs! I no longer trust purchasing this brand through Amazon. I’ve purchased 3 of these before receiving this gray knockoff. Attached are photos comparing it to the “real” white iplay hat I also recently purchased. The gray hat is not safe for my baby to wear. There are no inside tags, the brand label is off, the material feels and looks very different, the string is thin and the plastic fastener is completely different. They came packaged differently as well. I can’t believe this would pass for the real thing. Disappointed, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 3 week old daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is three weeks old and this hat, at its tightest, fit her perfectly! She is at about rhe 73% for weight and I believe her head is similarly proportioned. I used this hat on a very sunny day in our backyard and it shielded her from the sun very well. I am so happy that this hat will grow with her over the coming months. The navy color was exactly as pictured. The material seems like it will wash and wear well. It folds up nicely without getting mishapen. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Littleton CO

customer_reviews.title: His go-to Summer hat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 month old for the beach in the 9-18 month size because it's adjustable and I wanted him to be able to use his for months to come, and am so glad I did! He does have a large head but the hat still fits him perfectly when drawstring is pulled, is super cute and protects his head, face and neck from the sun. Washes well also and is easy to fold up and take with us everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, weight and coverage
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hat for our 5 month old daughter. Her head size is in the 75% on the growth chart and this fits with room to grow but not too floppy. The coverage from the sun is good and the weight of the fabric is also light and didn't make her too sweaty. The strings to tighten the hat were also long enough as well. Overall this is a great hat and a decent value. I would order this again if we needed another.
customer_reviews.author: EGReviewsTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Summer essential!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second summer ordering these hats bc our son grew out of the baby hats this year. He is 18m and the 2T-4T size looks like it will last us several summers! We buy the white and gray one bc they are gender neutral and go with any bathing suit. I love that it provides neck protection and they dry quickly after swimming. Easy to throw in the diaper bag although they do get a bit wrinkled but the wrinkles come out when wet. I absolutely love these hats and they have done a great job protecting him from sunburn!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY Recommend for infants/toddlers in the sun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfection in and out of the water! Bought two for a week long trip to Florida for my fair skin 1 year old. It stayed on his head perfectly to protect from the sun and his few times of fighting to take it off. It held up well with dunking in the pool and dries very quickly. Protected his neck and shoulders well too. I HIGHLY recommend this in combination with sunscreen for great sun protection! Washes very well in the washer or by hand (I did this after our days at the beach).
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and hat but it did not not fit my daughter well. It runs small and doesn’t really have a shape to it.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudopod

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: Edit: This fit for his first summer and is fitting again for his second summer! I couldn't be more pleased that I don't have to buy more hats for his bigger head. He really needs the protection with his thin blonde hair. I bought the infant size for my 6 month old and it fits well with the tightening string. It also looks like it has room for his already large head to grow. Very cute and covers his neck and face well.
customer_reviews.author: bluesky

customer_reviews.title: OUR FAVORITE HAT! Good Quality and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for little ones that wont wear sunglasses. My little girl has been wearing one since she was a few weeks old, shes now almost 10 months (we live in SC so its hot and sunny) I work in the eye care field so protection is obviously important to me. We are on our second one (she grew) I intend on putting the smaller size up for our next little one and have no doubts it will last!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute little hat
customer_reviews.text: Now it is our everyday go-to hat. My baby has a large head so I ordered the large size, I like it is adjustable so even it is a little bit large, I can still adjust it to fit and expect it to last for a long time. My toddler did not refuse to wear it, so I think it is comfortable for her, and she looks so cute in it, we wear the hat to park, to walk, to the beach, you name it, and it is working great, it not only protects face area, but also the neck. I bought a few more hats from iplay but this one is the most used one.
customer_reviews.author: M.W

customer_reviews.title: The adjustable back makes all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 of these hats. Originally I bought for my daughter who was a preemie as it was impossible to find a hat that would fit her head. She has been using her hat for 2 years, and it still fits. These hats are soft, comfortable, hold up well in the washing machine, dry quickly when they get wet, and are absolutely amazing because they adjust in the back. With that adjustment, it helps the hat not push down on the ear line and makes the chin ties less irritable. Highly recommend! All 3 of my kiddos have one as we live this design!
customer_reviews.author: Tim & Riss Patnode

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Easy to keep in your bag. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my son perfectly! He’s 7.5 months old and has a very large head for his age. I think due to the shape it will grow with him just fine. We have used this hat for multiple pool days and it has exceeded our expectation providing plenty of coverage every time. Living in hot Las Vegas this is a must. I keep it rolled up in his diaper bag at all times because the sun is nearly unavoidable here! The best part is how lightweight it is. Saves him from getting over heated
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Klorman

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Cute and adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: We love this hat. It is adorable. Baby’s neck, forehead, and head are protected from the sun which is a huge relief to us as new parents. I love that this hat is adjustable. It can be tightened pretty easily so it never falls off her cute little head while we’re out. We don’t even tie the string under her chin. We just tighten it until it’s secure on her head and put the strings behind her and out of the way so they’re not making her uncomfortable. The hat stays on just fine! Babies can’t wear sunscreen until they’re 6 months old so this hat has been a lifesaver for our summer baby! Don’t hesitate—buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Wilde

customer_reviews.title: No structure but super cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave a three because the brim is extra floppy and cover falls on babies face. Beep to flip flap up to even see which defeats the purpose of providing full coverage from the sun. Colors are vibrant, super soft and comfy. 8-month keeps it on. The straps we tie around the back of her head and the wind does not blow off. Would not purchase again because the front flap is super floppy not structure as appears in images. Also I did not read any reviews prior to purchasing which could have assisted in my decision and prevented the 3-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I loved this hat for my baby for the one summer we got to use it. Unfortunately the adjustable string broke soon after we started using it for her second summer, she’s 18 months. (I have no idea how it broke, toddler may have pulled the hat off her head too hard?) We didn’t even get two summer seasons out of it so I’m disappointed considering we lost the main value this hat offered—adjustable to fit through a couple years. Really bummed as I wanted to love this hat long term but I can’t recommend it for durability unless I got one with a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: demchuk

customer_reviews.title: a little small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 9-18 month size for my 13 month old baby girl who has a normal size head. It seems to fit small? Maybe that's how it is intended to fit, but I expected it to be bigger. since it seems to fit small she easily pulls it off. it does have a strap to tie under chin in a bow. I will need to order something thicker as this seems like the material fishing shirts are made of - thin and breezy. I need this for the beach where it is super windy so i think the material whill be blowing and not stay down much to cover her skin.
customer_reviews.author: ARAdami

customer_reviews.title: Good for safaris or just a walk around the block
customer_reviews.text: My babe looks like he’s going on a safari in this hat, but better to be protected than get a sunburn. We use it a lot for walks because it’s easier to shade babe than apply sunscreen. The hat is very packable, soft and doesn’t make babe hot. It’s adjustable to fit his head, but we don’t use the ties around his chin because babe just chews them. Overall, it’s a good buy and particularly good if you’re spending a lot of time outdoors or at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D

customer_reviews.title: Droops
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this hat got such positive reviews... which is why I bought it! Unfortunately... it droops so low that it covers my babies whole face. Poorly designed in my opinion. Now I'm on the hunt for a bucket hat, which has more firm shape and provides shade without drooping into my babies eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy, but overall decent quality
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked the hat to be just a tad bit more sturdy. I think having a wire in the brim would be helpful to keep the shape of the brim so the sun stays out of the eyes. We received the wrong size but it still sort of fits, the tightening mechanism is a little cheap and doesn't really work well, it keeps loosening. Overall though, it's super cute, covers the neck and most of the face, and seems pretty durable. We washed it once but did not put it in the dryer. I think it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Protective
customer_reviews.text: This is the second hat I've purchased, my son outgrew the first. I had no issues with the first one. This larger size though has a crisp fold down the center of the hat that I can't get out. Washed and dried it, it's still there. I can't bring myself to iron a toddler sunhat, so he just wears it with a big crease in it that looks ridiculous. It does protect his neck and he leaves it on, so ultimately it does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hats for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the only brand I buy of sunhats for my babes. My son had one sized I think 0-6 months (?) that he ended up actually making work until around 1 year because of the adjustable strap. I saved that one for the next baby due soon, and I bought my 2.5 yr old son another one sized 2-4 yrs this summer and it’s perfection. I always get grey because it matches any swim suit and doesn’t show stains as much as white could. I highly recommend this brand, and this would be perfect for a baby shower gift basket for any babies being born in the spring and summer months.
customer_reviews.author: MMama

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, one complaint
customer_reviews.text: The hat is adorable! Fits great, the strap will be perfect to keep it on, and it’s cute. I purchased the 0-6 month size for my three month old son and I think the hat will fit him until the end of the summer (it’s May now). The only complaint I have is that it came folded up with a big crease in the brim that I don’t think I’ll ever be able to get out :( I wish they folded it a different way to not have that big crease down the middle (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: LoganK

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage, light and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we bought this hat. My son has a big head and it’s nice that these adjust to fit. The first one we bought stays at daycare and this one stays at home. We live in sunny Southern California and like the full coverage it provides. Size: we got the 2T/4T size for my 14 month old. His head was 48 cm (80th percentile) when we got it and it fits him really well. Slides down a little in front but it doesn’t bother him. He keeps it on for a good hour before trying to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE LOVES INCLUDING THE LITTLE ONE WEARING IT
customer_reviews.text: so... my son HATES hats.. beanies ANYTHING ON HIS HEAD since day one as a infant and we had a zoo day and i couldn’t stand the thought of son hitting my son directly at such a young age... and sunscreen wasn’t going to be enough so I got him this little hat for our zoo day and he loved it! It’s adjustable so works with all head sizes and we also saw a little girl at the zoo with the same one but in pink! So it’s mama group approved, thank god he loves this hat because he now wears it with any outdoor activity we do to protect him.
customer_reviews.author: Davina Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hat for babies!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find for us! We love to hike and swim and visit national parks and our son was four months when I venture back on a trail this summer. It kept him protected from the sun while in the carrier and when we were at the pools and also kept him cool when we got the it wet during hikes. The fabric was soft so didn’t bother him and the ear flaps were great to protect his ears and checks. Fits great, great quality, and we will be ordering the next size up!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality infant hat - slippery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hat in blue and it is very cute. Keeps baby's head and neck protected. I like that it can be loosened and tightened for head circumference but I do find it still slips around baby's head - would be nice if it had something on the inside to keep it from slipping so much - I'm not sure what that soft rubbery stuff is called you find on clothes sometimes to keep them from slipping... will try to find something aftermarket to add to the hat so it doesn't keep slipping into baby's eyes.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great even for a newborn
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! I bought it for my 1-month-old to wear when I carry him in a carrier And his cute little head is sticking out into the California sun. I’m happy to report that the hat is great, it fits him even though his head is small at this point, and I feel good knowing the hat offers a UV protection. Can’t wait to try it out on a beach in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: Great summer hat for Baby - even for a baby who hates hats like mine!
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps the sun off baby's face and neck, helps keep baby cool and is easy to take on and off. It didn't do much to keep the sun out of his eyes unless the sun is directly overhead and Baby's positioned well. It also slips and slides sometimes and needs adjusting but overall it's a great hat and my Baby didn't fight it like he does every other hat. It's comfortable, cute and works. Also adjustable! Which is great, I got a long use out of this hat. Even as he got older he could still wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for sun and bugs!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST hat for summer! My two year old (who HATES wearing hats) wore this for our 4 day camping trip. She left it on while swimming, playing in the hose, hiking, boating, eating, and playing in the dirt. I noticed that she sweated less than usual, and her head didn’t get sun burned or attacked by bugs through her thin hair. I couldn’t be happier and will be ordering one for my 4 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Z

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: With so many reviews how could I go so wrong!? Probably one of the worst purchases I've made on Amazon. The draw string was sewn into the brim of the hat, I could only tighten it about two inches. When I was checking to see if that was enough to fit my kiddos head I realized the slightest tug on the hat completely loosened the drawstring, rendering it completely useless on the head of a toddler even if I had full use of the drawstring. Will not be buying iPlay ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The only, although huge problem about this item, is whatever material is used for the bill of the hat. My son used it soon as it arrived, fits beautiful, the color is great and is soft. However, after a few uses the bill of the hat became permanently misshapen. I am so disappointed. It is probably made of paper...
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage hat, quality control lacking
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat and all of the coverage it provides however the one I received brand new with the tags had this gross brown stain on it. I totally would have sent it back but I was leaving for vacation that day and needed it. Unfortunately it didn’t even come out in the wash which is a huge bummer. Seems like it might be grease. I would expect quality control to be a little better especially as this was sealed in plastic wrap during shipping so it must have happened at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: ShopTillYouDrop

customer_reviews.title: So many compliments on this super protective hat
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised but my daughter keeps this hat on her head. She has been wearing it since about 6 months old. It is a little big on her and can be used well into her toddler years. The strap in the back to hold it tighter works well. The visor on the hat is long which makes it so she can't see sometimes so we flip it up....but it does an excellent job providing cover for her eyes especially since she wont keep sunglasses on. The neck covering piece works well to protect. The tie under the cap stays in place if knotted. We have a white and a pink and get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: jlow

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hat with rush shipping to Alaska when AK Airlines ran last minute deals to Hawaii for $147! 😊 Kinda hard (impossible) to find a baby sun hat in Anchorage in September. 🤷‍♀️ Followed the reviews, ordered the 9-18 mo size for my 5 mo old. She is wearing 9 mo clothes and has a big head circumference besides. The toggle kept it nice and snug, even playing on the beach. It's a little extra floppy, but I liked getting the full wraparound protection, and even appreciated the extra cover it provided when I would nurse her at the pool. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaGrown

customer_reviews.title: Good hat for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 0-6 months for my 4 month old and it firs, but there isn't much room to grow (50th percentile). The hat itself is great. I've ordered a different hat and a sun protectant shirt from iplay and they've all worked great. The hat is very light weight and covers his head and neck well. There is a little structure to the brim of the hat, but it's flexible enough for me to fold up and put in the pocket on my ergo baby carrier. I will be ordering this hat for my girls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter likes it and finds it to be comfortable. Should fit for a few summers (she’s almost 2 and 50th percentile). Has worked well for her for 5 months now and still looks good after a few washes. Easily adjusts although it needs to be righted a few times each hour. Expect this to hold up for the next one who’s still baking too!
customer_reviews.author: Kris13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection and stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for my active 14 month old. Provides shade for face and completely covers top of head, ears and back of neck. It has an adjustable strap that goes around the width of the hat to shrink and grow with head diameter. It has long fabric ties to secure strap under chin. I was concerned these would be able to easily untie and remove hat but it wasnt touched and left it alone. This hat worked better than some of the other hats i have which secure under the chin with velcro. This would make a great baby shower or birthday gift or hat to have around the house for your kiddos and visiting kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunhat for baby!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is a great purchase! We upgraded to this hat for the summer since my son has outgrown his "baby" sunhats from last year. It is perfect for boat rides and swimming. It floats, too, which is an extra bonus! I love that it covers his neck as well. He tolerates it as well as any hat...I just make sure to tie the strings in a secure little bow.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goggans

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby hat! Got this as soon as my baby was able to swim. Fully adjustable to even the smallest heads. Great front and side protection while still allowing her to see great. The tie under the chin is easy to use and also works for a chew toy in the water. Worth it just buy it! We use it every other day in Hawaii it's just great!
customer_reviews.author: Maui Riss

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! It smelled like chemicals when we opened the package. It does not offer enough face coverage from the sun and the ties are super short to the point of not being usable.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hat for infant!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect hat for my 9mo old baby. She will be able to wear it all summer and into the fall. It covers the back of the neck, ears and forehead and provides good shade on her face. I liked it so much i ordered more in different colors. It is soft breathable material. It also adjusts in the back to fit the size of your babies head.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool and beach. Ok for backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: This hat is great for the pool and/or beach. It covers the face, ears and neck well and I like that it's adjustable. It's just ok for being out in hot weather- not near the water. We do a lot of hiking with our son in a hiking backpack and this hat makes him very hot and sweaty. I have to continually pour water on it so it cools him and the hat down, which is kinda a pain since it dries so quickly lol. It is very light weight which is helpful, just not as versatile as we need for our active family
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand! Check out the green sprouts website!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! So soft, lightweight, and breathable! I bought 2 sizes bigger for my 6 month old son because he weighs 20lbs. It is a little too big on him but it can be adjusted to tighten around the crown of his head. My favorite part of this purchase though was the coupon that came with it. $25 off a $50 purchase! And because I took the time to check out their website and purchase more from them I am now enlightened and sharing with all my mommy friends.
customer_reviews.author: Shizzlecrizzle

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat so much that when I thought we lost it I ordered another one (we found it). The sizing we ordered was 9-18m and I don’t know if it will fit our daughter that long. We got it when she was 6m and she has been wearing it the last 4m several times a week. It’s super cute and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: DK Park

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection even when wet!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has juvenile dermatomyositis but loves the water and the beach. Sun exposure makes her condition flare up so we've been trying to find something to help her get a bit of water time without the damaging effects. This hat did the trick. It stayed on and the brim stayed firm even when wet. She was able to play in the waves and enjoy a little beach time without worrying about the sun getting on her face and neck even when wet!
customer_reviews.author: Brandynn

customer_reviews.title: Good sun hat, somewhat big for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Great sun hat, but definitely a better fit for an older infant. I first bought this for a lake trip when my son was 3 weeks old. It was definitely a bit big at that point, but it worked ok (we tried to keep him in the shade anyway). Now he’s 3 months and the fit is much better. I don’t think anything can truly fit a kid from birth to 6 months - at least not very well - but I’ve been pleased with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight hat for summer with sun and wind protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 6 month old baby (size 9-18 months) and does fit her but a little big. It does have the ties around the chin and a small pull on back to make sure it it slightly tighter so doesn’t fall off. Works when we went in the boat with the wind plus extra protection from the hot sun with also being lighter fabric, so cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Laura ~v~

customer_reviews.title: Great kid’s summer hat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hats. They tie under the chin, but they also have an elastic band that you can tighten at the back of your child’s head so they keep the hat on. I also love the flap that covers their ears and neck. I love this hat so much that I bought my son a bigger size and my daughter wears this hat now. Other parents ask me all the time where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and that’s what matters. Daughter keeps pulling at the strings and the cap isn’t exactly form fitting but there is a small elastic section in the back to help with sizing. My kid just had a small head. You can definitely tell where the back of the hat ends because even though we covered our daughter in sunscreen, she still got a little tan but not on her back or neck where the hat ended. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sernas

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I do not love this hat. I can't even say that I liked it and my baby agrees. The tightening mechanism on the back of the hat does not stay tight. So that hat will keep coming loose and fall over his eyes. Also the tie strap underneath the super inconvenient when working with a baby that moves a lot. Velcro would be a much better choice. I was disappointed because I had a similar hat from this company and really loved it
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Toggle, Great Hat, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This hat is really cute and a must have for sunny days. My baby is 2 months old and it provides her the protection she needs and it seems breathable so she doesn’t overheat. There is an adjustable toggle on it so can fit for a longer period of time. I like the material of the hat, it seems like water would just bead up on it and roll off (I haven’t tested that yet!) Perfect hat for a beach vacation or day at the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Love the protection
customer_reviews.text: We are big boaters (out on the water 2-3 times a week) and we do not leave home without this to protect our little ones. The kids love their hats. The material is nice and soft and we love that it not only protects their head but their neck as well. We often will get it a little wet and put it on their heads to keep them cool on the hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great protection.
customer_reviews.text: Covers complete neck down to shoulders. Will protect toddlers head well but with the added protection the child’s head gets hot and sweaty. It’s the nature of a hat. The sun protection is outstanding though. It fits well and has an adjustable string to go under the chin to hold hat one when breezy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike mutter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our trip in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely wonderful for our recent family vacation. It was the first trip we’ve taken with our little guy and I’m so glad we had this hat. It is very lightweight and allowed for his head to breath even in the Florida heat. And the Shaw protection was great as well - not just for the top of his head, but also for his neck. My favorite feature was the drawstring in the back - it allowed for us to tighten the hat to his head for a perfect fit, and we’ll have room to grow and keep using it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Dennis

customer_reviews.title: 2nd hat, we love it!
customer_reviews.text: We had the 12-18 month size and had to order the 2T-4T size recently. My little one loves her hat. It's lightweight so it stays on without bugging her. Protects her neck and her face from the sun. When it gets wet it doesn't get heavy. We absolutely love this brand and hat!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting little heads and more
customer_reviews.text: We have been getting these hats for our toddler since he was a baby, and we will continue to until he outgrows the largest size available. They are perfect for protecting his head, ears, and neck from the sun, and the tie-strap is essential in keeping it staying on his head. Super light and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. Bought a size 2t-4t for our 15 month old. It provides coverage for his whole head and shades his face. Brim gets a little floppy when it gets wet but it doesn’t drop in his face. The adjuster in the back is great to get the fit just right, we will be able to use this hat for at least one more summer! Pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LDale

customer_reviews.title: This hat works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son to keep him from getting too much sun on his face and neck during water time/outside time. I really have enjoyed having this hat because it really has helped. I like how the adjustable clasp on the back is so easy to use. As he grows, I can adjust this so he gets more wear out of it. I have bought from this brand before and it has never disappointed. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: darrynpolwart

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for a day in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a light weight, full coverage hat for my toddler. This is perfect for a day at the beach. It dries quickly and covers the entire face and neck. I previously used a Patagonia hat but the breath ability and lightness of this one cannot be matched. I have it in three colors!
customer_reviews.author: Josepha

customer_reviews.title: Great product that kids can grow into
customer_reviews.text: After owning one of these, I bought two more (one to keep at grandma's and one for daycare). I feel that the fabric is good quality, yet lightweight. I like the drawstring adjustment, so my kid can grow into it. All around, good hat. I will buy the next size up, when the times comes.
customer_reviews.author: R White

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and affordable hat!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviewers, this hat is amazing quality for the price and does the job perfectly. My baby never fussed about wearing it and it keeps the sun out of her eyes and off her neck when we go for walks in the front carrier. Nice and light for those hot summer days but stays on securely and provides full protection. Easily folds into a tiny roll to fit in the diaper bag with almost no weight. I'll buy another one without hesitation when this one is outgrown!
customer_reviews.author: Spyderwind

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy when wet, but great hat
customer_reviews.text: Took this hat to Aruba with my two year old. It did block the sun, was light weight, and very nice fit. However, the brim is a little flimsy to hold up to the constant wind, and once wet, it wasn't too sturdy. Though, normal pool days this is amazing. I get laughed at by my SIL for the crazy amount of sun protection this hat has, but I'd rather deal with that than sunburn!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by daycare
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended by our daycare and we have bought it in two sizes now. Smaller size fit our kiddo for the whole summer season (he was about 4 months - 12 months wearing it) and now we ordered 2T-4T. Doesn't seem too big for him. He's currently in mostly 2T clothes, just over 2 years. it's really lightweight material so it doesn't bug him like a baseball hat does.
customer_reviews.author: jlcheeburger

customer_reviews.title: Great sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this has been one of the best purchases for my baby. I’ve used this hat since she was about three months old and she still has lots of room to grow into it. The adjustable part of it is great. The material is pretty soft as well. Super cute color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie

customer_reviews.title: Decent kids water play hat
customer_reviews.text: The material for this hat was thinner than I was expecting hence the 4 stars. It is a nice lightweight hat for water play/beach, etc. I do wish it was a little sturdier material though because the material is so thin, the hat is pretty floppy so the hat slides down a little bit and my kid's eyes get covered. Its decent enough though so I won't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie L.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional sun hat to keep your little love protected!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fitting, adjustable hat for your infant/ toddler that provides exceptional sun protection! Also nice that it has the tie under the chin so your little one won't pull it off! We used it around 6 months, 12 months, 18 months and I won't be surprised if it still fits around age 2!
customer_reviews.author: Ehimmelman

customer_reviews.title: Hat can NOT get wet, brim literally droops when wet with no interior support.
customer_reviews.text: Hat worked good for preventing sunburns however this hat can NOT get wet at all! We decided to go to the pool and as soon as the brim got wet it literally droops and covered my daughters eyes making it unwearable. Took even longer just to dry and reshape. If you’re looking for an all weather hat that can get wet this is not it. I would not recommend this product:
customer_reviews.author: kelsey Braden

customer_reviews.title: The hat so nice we bought it twice.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hat, our son wore it to one event and we promptly lost it. My experience with it was positive enough to buy it again. It's very lightweight, breathable, dries quickly, and fits well. My husband thinks it makes the baby look like an imperial officer from star wars.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Derp

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: Although cute, this hat just fit weird every time I tried to get my son to wear it. The front part always flopped down and annoyed him and it always kinda slid to the side. We ended up donating it and going with a high quality one from a sports store.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Hynson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my son was a newborn (6pounds 9 ounces). Fit him then and fits him now (he's 11 months with a larger head) What's great about this is it's SUPER light weight, covers the neck (right, left and back side) and it has a toe below the chin and a tighter/string on the back to adjust it to his head size. My son HATES hats and pulls them off right away, this one he doesn't mind!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Provides great sun protection and fits well with adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hat for my 22 mo. old to wear on our recent vacation. I got a size 3-4T because she has a large head and it was a bit big for her. However, it still fits fine since there is a singe in the back, which is nice. Now she'll have time to grow into it and it will last longer. I like that it has a tie at the bottom to keep her from pulling it all the way off her head. The hat did get wet while she was wearing it but held it's shape and dried quickly. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase and would recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and cone shaped
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 14 months and the 2T hat is snug. Very pointy shaped on top and not rounded to fit a head. I would have preferred increased width on the brim to cover her cheeks, but perhaps with a bigger fit the coverage would have been better
customer_reviews.author: Jen_J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fun in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fun in the sun! Generously sized and easily adjusted to accommodate a growing baby/toddler. The material is very soft and dries fairly quickly. It ties under the chin and stays in place well. The ear and neck flaps offer great coverage and the small bill provides a nice level of shade for little ones who refuse to wear sunglasses. Absolutely worth buying! It seems this will fit for quite some time and should hold up for a couple seasons of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Better than the bucket hats
customer_reviews.text: These hats are great. I bought a couple for my son last year and ordered the next size up for this year. I like them better than the bucket hats (even though they are less attractive) because my son can still see well in them. The bucket hat tends to block his side view making him frustrated which makes him pull it off. He leaves these on much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This was my 5th hat of the kind! Protects eyes and neck, ties up so you never lose it when windy, and the strap on the back allows for adjustment for the head size, so in theory a kid can wear 1 size for 3 years, as it was in my case. Very light material, breathable and dries fast. On top, there's a variety of colors to choose from, so one can match the hat to swimsuit or else. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Antonie Kalchevski

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but functional
customer_reviews.text: I got the 9-18 month hat for my son and he’s been wearing it since he was about 5 months old. He’s 7 months now and it’s still a little big but only because the toggle adjuster in the back doesn’t stay completely tightened. It also tends to go over his eyes which I imagine is because it’s a bit big on him. He does have a smaller than average head size as well. I like the hat but once he outgrows it I will be purchasing a Sunday Afternoon sun hat of similar style.
customer_reviews.author: Kmerikson

customer_reviews.title: Yes to this company and their products!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and company. With this order I was also given a coupon to their company website. I figured hey, why not check it out. I bought 3 swim diapers and they are also amazing! Their products are durable, protective, and well made. They shipped very fast as well. I also bought the potty training underwear, which are great! They are regular underwear but with some extra protection. I will continue to buy products from this company and I highly suggest them.
customer_reviews.author: ajmac

customer_reviews.title: My Boy Looks Good in a Baby Girl's Hat
customer_reviews.text: And that's okay. This hat really should be considered unisex. Anyways, our son has an average sized-head, and it fits nicely. He's not a beachgoer because we hate sand, but he wears this for sun protection when we can muster up the energy to go for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great little hat, will fit for years!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baby! With the adjustment strap, for my 3 month old just fine. Still a little bit but she's small so the hat would shift a little but no big deal. We'll be able to use it for years. Protected against the sun but tried to stay in the shade regardless. Glad I had it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Pink and Protective
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have found the perfect fitting sun hat for my 2 year old Granddaughter! It is adjustable so It should carry her through 2 or 3 Summers. The long sides and back are just what we needed to protect her tiny little neck and precious ears.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Floppy brim makes it unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this hair for my toddler. The first time she wore it and got wet, the brim flopped right down in her eyes and she couldn't see. Made it pretty useless. The brim needs to be made stiff - like a ball cap - and them it would be great. I saved it, thinking I might use it for my younger son but instead discovered George Hats and will never look back!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these - 1 for each of my kids. I like it better on my son only because my daughter's pony tail doesn't fit very well under it. It is good for sun shade but we also use it for wooded areas during tick season. In full sun on a high temp day, i like to dip everything but the bill in cool water before putting on the kids to help keep them cool.
customer_reviews.author: JNK

customer_reviews.title: I love this hat
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. I bought it for my son twice! I know when I'm putting this hat on that it's going to stay in place and block the sun for my little boy. this hat is very breathable and when I take it off his head he doesn't have that hot, sweaty, hat head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't impressed with this hat. It's soft, but it's SO flimsy, the bill is constantly falling down into his eyes. I expected a higher quality material and product, but I don't think it could get much lower. It doesn't have any shape to it really at all.
customer_reviews.author: JamieLynn Wyo

customer_reviews.title: GET THE HAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sun hat! My daughter is almost 18 months and this hat (size 2T-4T) fits her great! She has a little bigger than average head, but there is room to grow! It is great that you can cinch it tight around their head! It protects head, face, ears and neck from the sun! Super soft. We bought another because we love it so much! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A hat worth buying
customer_reviews.text: What a great hat! I have a 5 month old and it fits him perfectly because of the adjustable strings. I love this hat because it'll fit him later on because of those strings. However, I made the mistake of not applying sunscreen because of how much the hat covers. So, I recommend taking extra precautions and apply sunscreen while your buddle of joy wear this hat. Great hat, covers ears, and the adjustable strings are a money saver in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This hat was purchased for my 5 month old twin girls and there is plenty of room for their heads to grow into them. The only problem I had was that I purchased two but received two different brands and they weren't exactly the same shade of white. I don't care enough to return and will just use them. But if I pay for two of something I feel like I should have gotten the same hat times two.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Propert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the hot sun!
customer_reviews.text: This had was perfect for my one year old grandson this summer in the pool and sun. I love the neck and shoulder coverage. The tie kept him from pulling off the hat. It was light and comfortable. Such a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bev Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Bill is lacking rigidity
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this cap is great except for one major flaw, the bill. The bill has no rigidity so when it gets wet it will fold down in your childs face and obstruct their vision. This might be passable for an older child but for infants and toddlers it makes the hat unusable around the pool or beach.
customer_reviews.author: B Rad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hat
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful hat. It’s light, soft and has great sun-protection. The visor is a great length and I love how you can pull in the tab to tighten it. My baby boy is a very big boy and we had to size up. I also bought these same hats for my twin girls 3 times and it’s the same high quality every time.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrs

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a trip to Hawaii as a means of keeping my 21 month old from getting burned. My main concern was him trying to rip it off once it was put on his head, but the good news is that the chin strap, combined with all the distractions at the beach, kept the hat on for the entire duration of our beach days (hours each day). He pretty much forgot that he was wearing a hat. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This protected my 4 month old from the sun really well. It also kept him cool and was really comfortable. I’m really glad it has a drawstring for adjusting the fit. It washed well too. The visor didn’t lose its shape and the stitching held up well. I didn’t run it through the dryer. This is going to work well for another 2-3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Dries fast and offers very full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I like the full neck coverage but the front is a little much. It’s hard for my son to see anything. I found it slightly difficult to keep it on at the windy beach on a wiggly baby too. I do appreciate the full coverage and lightweight fabric. Dries very quickly as well. Baby sun hats are tough but this is a decent one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dano

customer_reviews.title: Excited to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 month old. We are going on a camping trip to Yosemite at the end of the month and I wanted something to protect his head and face from the sun. I haven't used it yet but I will update this review after our camping trip. Other than that, the color and size is great. The fabric is lightweight and once I tie it on, it stays pretty well, especially with a baby that moves quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: hywnchika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for BOYS too
customer_reviews.text: We love this hat. Not sure why it specifies it’s for girls — we use it for our sun! We love that the back covers his neck. He is 13 months and the 0-6 month size fits him perfectly. We ended up buying a second one to keep in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, light weight
customer_reviews.text: My daughter actually kept this hat on her head the whole time we were at the beach- i think it's because of how light weight it felt on her head- the strap in the back to adjust the size is helpful- it was pretty windy and i was able to tighten it just a little bit so it didn't fly off... would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jbl1230

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat, light weight, adjustable back tie, and back flap. Light enough to be able to breath when worn and comfortable for the kids. My little one doesn't fuss with this and almost forgets it is on her head. I would recommend this hat. I have bought many I play. hats as my little one is growing. I really like the back flap protection.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried tons of hats for my baby and this one is the best. Great price and great fit. He started wearing it when he was 3 months old and is now almost 5 months old. It has an adjustable strap. Great hat!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Total coverage
customer_reviews.text: This hat is amazing! Total coverage. Love the long flap in the back. Easy to adjust to size. My son was 8 months when I got it so we got the larger size, had no problem adjusting it. The only thing I didn't like is that the material staine easily from the sunscreen and I wasn't able to remove it completely. Since we got the dark blue color it is a bit noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I order a white hat for our ocean vacation, unfortunately after first use the color started to get more yellow, maybe is the ocean water cause i dont know
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

product_meta.title: i play. by green sprouts Baby Girls' Sun Hat
product_meta.description: The Flap Sun Protection Hat protects baby’s head, neck, and eyes while playing in the sun. The wicking liner is breathable for comfort, and the UPF 50+ material dries quickly if it gets wet to support baby’s active play. The tie strap keep the hat in place, and the adjustable toggle creates a custom-fit as baby grows! Parents love how easy it is to pack for on-the-go activities, and the wide variety of classic colors.
feature_bullets: Extra neck coverage, stay-put tie strap
Adjustable toggle for custom fit & to grow with baby
Lightweight & packable for easy on the go
